# Paquetes

```{r}
library(sf) # simple features
# library(raster)
# library(spData)
library(dplyr)
library(tmap)
```

# Datos

```{r}
data("world", package = "spData")
world
```

```{r}
class(world)
```

```{r}
# basic plot
plot(world)
```

# EDA

```{r}
# basic plot with filter
world %>% 
  filter(continent == "South America") %>% 
  plot()
```

```{r}
world %>% 
  filter(lifeExp > 65) %>% 
  select(name_long, lifeExp) %>% 
  arrange(desc(lifeExp)) 
```

```{r}
world %>% 
  filter(lifeExp > 65) %>% 
  select(name_long, lifeExp) %>% 
  arrange(desc(lifeExp)) %>% 
  tm_shape() +
  tm_fill("lifeExp") +
  tm_borders()
```
